title: is_type_structurally_recursive diverges on some structurally recursive types

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-stable
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from one stable version to another.

labels.name: I-hang
labels.description: Issue: The compiler never terminates, due to infinite loops, deadlock, livelock, etc.

body:
For example, compilation of the following program diverges: ```rust struct A { x: T, y: A>, } struct B { z: A } fn main() {} ``` Found while examining issue from #74201, but this one has a different root cause.
rustc log

``` [DEBUG rustc_middle::ty::util] is_type_representable: A [DEBUG rustc_middle::ty::util] is_type_structurally_recursive: A x.rs:1:1: 4:2 (#0) [DEBUG rustc_middle::ty::util] is_type_structurally_recursive: T x.rs:2:8: 2:9 (#0) [DEBUG rustc_middle::ty::util] is_type_structurally_recursive: A> x.rs:3:8: 3:15 (#0) [DEBUG rustc_middle::ty::util] SelfRecursive: A contains A> [DEBUG rustc_middle::ty::util] is_type_representable: A is SelfRecursive([x.rs:3:8: 3:15 (#0)]) error[E0072]: recursive type `A` has infinite size --> x.rs:1:1 | 1 | struct A { | ^^^^^^^^^^^ recursive type has infinite size 2 | x: T, 3 | y: A>, | ------- recursive without indirection | help: insert some indirection (e.g., a `Box`, `Rc`, or `&`) to make `A` representable | 3 | y: Box>>, | ^^^^ ^ [DEBUG rustc_middle::ty::util] is_type_representable: B [DEBUG rustc_middle::ty::util] is_type_structurally_recursive: B x.rs:6:1: 8:2 (#0) [DEBUG rustc_middle::ty::util] is_type_structurally_recursive: A x.rs:7:8: 7:16 (#0) [DEBUG rustc_middle::ty::util] is_type_structurally_recursive: usize x.rs:2:8: 2:9 (#0) [DEBUG rustc_middle::ty::util] is_type_structurally_recursive: A> x.rs:3:8: 3:15 (#0) [DEBUG rustc_middle::ty::util] is_type_structurally_recursive: A x.rs:2:8: 2:9 (#0) [DEBUG rustc_middle::ty::util] ContainsRecursive: A contains A [DEBUG rustc_middle::ty::util] is_type_structurally_recursive: A>> x.rs:3:8: 3:15 (#0) ... ```
